legal.acceptanceText: By using Aether, you agree to these terms.
legal.serviceText: Aether is a voice AI for endangered language preservation, starting with Toishanese.
legal.dataUsePoint1: Voice recordings are anonymized for language model training
legal.dataUsePoint2: No personally identifiable information is stored
legal.dataUsePoint3: Your contributions help preserve endangered languages
legal.consentText: By recording audio, you consent to anonymized data use for language preservation.
legal.usageText: Free users have daily limits. Access codes provide unlimited usage.
legal.disclaimerText: Service is provided "as is" in beta. AI responses may contain errors.
legal.notCollectedPoint1: Name or email (unless you join waitlist)
legal.anonymizationText: All voice data is stripped of identifiers before training. No individual can be identified.
legal.sharingText: Anonymized data may be shared with research institutions and open-source language projects. We never sell personal data.
legal.rightsText: Stop using the service anytime. Due to anonymization, specific contributions cannot be retrieved after processing.
